titles.title: Global Health Act
To establish a United States Global Health Commission and a United States Global Health Attaché Program, and for other purposes.
To establish a United States Global Health Commission and a United States Global Health Attaché Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Intelligence (Permanent Select), and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
